tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Not recommended as he doesn't take time to explain to patients and has attitude. Not satisfied with the way of talk/listening to  patients.
I did a consultant for my daughter. I felt he is arrogant and disrespectful. *********** No respect for parents.

** ****** ***** * ** *** ******** ****** * **** *** ** ** ******I visited Aster CMI for my 6 months baby..I have already done MRI but Harish told me you have do it again, I request him its already done and he is 6 months baby..but he force us to do it.**** ****** **** **** ***** *** ***** He is very rude also, only give negative feedback to parents.
* ********* ** **** **** ***** **** ***** *** ****** **** ******** **** ** ********

My son had congested chest and they said we had to take drip and blood test, but Harish sir told us not to take drip and keep using medicine. Fever was gone in 2 days after that, and now he is happy and well. 5/5 doctor, very calm and friendly.
I went for fever for my child ok doctor was friendly and make understand and help us to child recovery
